column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I wanted to take a train trip through the countryside .
#id=2
#text=I went to the local train station .
#id=3
#text=Once I was at the station I carefully reviewed the train schedule until I found a train that was going where I wanted to go at a convenient time .
#id=4
#text=The trip I picked happened to leave at 8 am the next day .
#id=5
#text=I went to the ticket window and bought a round trip ticket for the train I had selected .
#id=6
#text=Having purchased my tickets , I went home and I packed a light suitcase with the necessities I would need for my trip .
#id=7
#text=That evening I set my alarm clock extra early so I would be sure to be on time for the train .
#id=8
#text=I woke up the next morning thanks to my early alarm clock .
#id=9
#text=I then showered , ate my breakfast and took my suitcase and left home for the train station .
#text=I arrived 20 minutes early which gave me plenty of time to get on the train and enjoy my trip .
